content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services. Iâ€™m here to help you schedule plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services. May I start by getting your name, please?
Thanks, Margie. Can you please provide the address where the plumbing service is needed?
Thank you, Margie. Let me check that address for our service availability... Good news, we do service your area. What would be an ideal time for our plumber to come by?

I understand, Margie. Would it help if I checked for openings next month, or would you prefer to contact us when your schedule frees up?

reason: Customer too busy to schedule at this time

content: No problem, Margie. Feel free to contact us anytime when you're ready to schedule. Have a great day!
